name: Adventures Extraordinaire TALP
description:
CLICK ON THE GAME IF WRITING DOESN'T WORK! NO MOBILE SUPPORT (as yet)!

A small text adventure made for the TALP Game Jam 2021, with a short but nice storyline that will let you revisit a well known fairy tale.

TALP aims to widen the player base for text adventures, games where the only interaction goes through single (VERB or NOUN) or double (VERB + NOUN) word prompts, the graphic is minimal, sound often absent, and the bulk of storytelling relies on the player reading text, and thinking about what commands to type.

Designing whit such limitations was fun, and coding a system from scratch, in pure javascript, added to the experience.

Hope you'll have some fun too playing it!

SORRY: it doesn't work with mobile text input yet!

You can find a cheatsheet with a map and a walkthrough HERE
